params.name: classes
params.description: Classes to add to the row `div`.

params.name: key.text
params.description: If `html` is set, this is not required. Text to use within the each key. If `html` is provided, the `text` option will be ignored.

params.name: key.classes
params.description: Classes to add to the key wrapper.

params.name: value.text
params.description: If `html` is set, this is not required. Text to use within the each value. If `html` is provided, the `text` option will be ignored.

params.name: value.html
params.description: If `text` is set, this is not required. HTML to use within the each value. If `html` is provided, the `text` option will be ignored.

params.name: value.classes
params.description: Classes to add to the value wrapper.

params.name: actions.classes
params.description: Classes to add to the actions wrapper.

params.name: actions.items
params.description: Array of action item objects.

params.name: href
params.description: The value of the link's `href` attribute for an action item.

params.name: text
params.description: If `html` is set, this is not required. Text to use within each action item. If `html` is provided, the `text` option will be ignored.

params.name: html
params.description: If `text` is set, this is not required. HTML to use within the each action item. If `html` is provided, the `text` option will be ignored.

params.name: visuallyHiddenText
params.description: Actions rely on context from the surrounding content so may require additional accessible text. Text supplied to this option is appended to the end. Use `html` for more complicated scenarios.

params.name: classes
params.description: Classes to add to the action item.

params.name: attributes
params.description: HTML attributes (for example data attributes) to add to the action item.

name: card
description: Whether the summary list should exist within a summary card or not. If true, this will apply a border around the summary list.

name: header
description: Data for the summary card header. If valid data is provided, will make the summary list a summary card regardless of if the `card` option is true or not.

params.name: title.text
params.description: If `html` is set, this is not required. Text to use within the each title. If `html` is provided, the `text` option will be ignored.

params.name: title.classes
params.description: Classes to add to the title wrapper.

params.name: actions.classes
params.description: Classes to add to the actions wrapper.

params.name: actions.items
params.description: Array of action item objects.

params.name: href
params.description: The value of the link's `href` attribute for an action item.

params.name: text
params.description: If `html` is set, this is not required. Text to use within each action item. If `html` is provided, the `text` option will be ignored.

params.name: html
params.description: If `text` is set, this is not required. HTML to use within the each action item. If `html` is provided, the `text` option will be ignored.

params.name: visuallyHiddenText
params.description: Actions rely on context from the surrounding content so may require additional accessible text. Text supplied to this option is appended to the end. Use `html` for more complicated scenarios.

params.name: classes
params.description: Classes to add to the action item.

params.name: attributes
params.description: HTML attributes (for example data attributes) to add to the action item.

name: classes
description: Classes to add to the container.

name: attributes
description: HTML attributes (for example data attributes) to add to the container.
